    • Method Detail

      • mouseClick

        public void mouseClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event,
                       SpaceShip spaceShip,
                       javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
        Handles mouse-button-click events. Left button - shoot, right button - stop moving space ship.

      • mouseListener

        public void mouseListener(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event,
                          SpaceShip spaceShip)
        Handles mouse-move events. If the cursor were at the left side from the space ship, it moves left, if the cursor were at the right side from the space ship, it moves right.

      • keyListener

        public void keyListener(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event,
                        SpaceShip spaceShip,
                        javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
        Handles keyboard events. If RIGHT key is pressed, space ship moves right. If LEFT key is pressed, space ship moves left. If DOWN key is pressed, space ship stops. If SPACE key is pressed, space ship shots. If Q key is pressed, current game stops and checks for a new best result.

      • quitGame

        private void quitGame()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Stops current game and checks for new best result. If new record, shows NewRecordScene, which prompts user to enter his name.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Starts a new game.

      • checkRecord

        private boolean checkRecord()
        Gets a list of top winners from the database, and checks if the current score is a new best result.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • showRecords

                 throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a list of top winners from the database, and shows it in a HOFScene window.
